parameters.query: SELECT last_seen_internal_date FROM gmail_cursor WHERE key = 'inbox';

={{ 'INSERT INTO gmail_cursor(key, last_seen_internal_date, updated_at) VALUES (' + "'inbox'" + ', ' + ($('Dedupe + Format').first().json.internalDate !== undefined ? $('Dedupe + Format').first().json.internalDate : 0) + ', NOW()) ON CONFLICT (key) DO UPDATE SET last_seen_internal_date = GREATEST(gmail_cursor.last_seen_internal_date, EXCLUDED.last_seen_internal_date), updated_at = NOW();' }}
